body_html:
This question is more about use of bazel than TensorFlow, so I'm going to close it out and recommend that you look into bazel documentation/support.

That said, perhaps you're looking for the java_import rule

This question is more about use of bazel than TensorFlow, so I'm going to close it out and recommend that you look into bazel documentation/support.
That said, perhaps you're looking for the java_import rule
body:
This question is more about use of bazel than TensorFlow, so I'm going to close it out and recommend that you look into bazel documentation/support.

That said, perhaps you're looking for the [`java_import`](https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/be/java.html#java_import) rule
